scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run tauri:build
scripts.dist:mac: cd packages/renderer && npm run tauri:build -- --target universal-apple-darwin
scripts.dist:win: cd packages/renderer && npm run tauri:build -- --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.dist:linux: cd packages/renderer && npm run tauri:build -- --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/renderer && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install && cd ../../landing && npm install
